40 
41  StCameraInterface::StCameraInterface(
42  StApi::IStDeviceReleasable *dev,
43  ros::NodeHandle nh_parent,
44  const std::string &camera_namespace,
45  StParameter *param,
46  uint32_t queue_size):
47  camera_namespace_(camera_namespace),
48  tl_dev_(dev),
49  nh_(nh_parent, camera_namespace_),
50  param_(param),
51  it_(nh_),
52  cinfo_(nh_),
53  msg_chunk_(nh_.advertise<omronsentech_camera::Chunk>(
54  std::string(STMSG_chunk), queue_size)),
55  queue_size_(queue_size),
56  it_campub_(it_.advertiseCamera(std::string(STMSG_image), queue_size)),
57  srv_read_node_(nh_.advertiseService(std::string(STSRV_R_node),
58  &StCameraInterface::readNodeCallback, this)),
59  srv_read_node_bool_(nh_.advertiseService(
60  std::string(STSRV_R_node_bool),
61  &StCameraInterface::readNodeBoolCallback, this)),
62  srv_read_node_enum_(nh_.advertiseService(
63  std::string(STSRV_R_node_enum),
64  &StCameraInterface::readNodeEnumCallback, this)),
65  srv_read_node_int_(nh_.advertiseService(
66  std::string(STSRV_R_node_int),
67  &StCameraInterface::readNodeIntCallback, this)),
68  srv_read_node_float_(nh_.advertiseService(
69  std::string(STSRV_R_node_float),
70  &StCameraInterface::readNodeFloatCallback, this)),
71  srv_read_node_string_(nh_.advertiseService(
72  std::string(STSRV_R_node_string),
73  &StCameraInterface::readNodeStringCallback, this)),
74  srv_write_node_(nh_.advertiseService(
75  std::string(STSRV_W_node),
76  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeCallback, this)),
77  srv_write_node_bool_(nh_.advertiseService(
78  std::string(STSRV_W_node_bool),
79  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeBoolCallback, this)),
80  srv_write_node_enum_int_(nh_.advertiseService(
81  std::string(STSRV_W_node_enum_int),
82  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeEnumIntCallback, this)),
83  srv_write_node_enum_str_(nh_.advertiseService(
84  std::string(STSRV_W_node_enum_str),
85  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeEnumStrCallback, this)),
86  srv_write_node_int_(nh_.advertiseService(
87  std::string(STSRV_W_node_int),
88  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeIntCallback, this)),
89  srv_write_node_float_(nh_.advertiseService(
90  std::string(STSRV_W_node_float),
91  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeFloatCallback, this)),
92  srv_write_node_string_(nh_.advertiseService(
93  std::string(STSRV_W_node_string),
94  &StCameraInterface::writeNodeStringCallback, this)),
95  srv_execute_node_(nh_.advertiseService(
96  std::string(STSRV_W_node_command),
97  &StCameraInterface::executeNodeCallback, this)),
98  srv_enable_chunk_(nh_.advertiseService(
99  std::string(STSRV_E_chunk),
100  &StCameraInterface::enableChunkCallback, this)),
101  srv_enable_trigger_(nh_.advertiseService(
102  std::string(STSRV_E_trigger),
103  &StCameraInterface::enableTriggerCallback, this)),
104  srv_enable_event_node_(nh_.advertiseService(
105  std::string(STSRV_E_event_node),
106  &StCameraInterface::enableEventNodeCallback, this)),
107  srv_enable_image_acquisition_(nh_.advertiseService(
108  std::string(STSRV_E_image_acquisition),
109  &StCameraInterface::enableImageAcquisitionCallback, this)),
110  srv_enable_event_acquisition_(nh_.advertiseService(
111  std::string(STSRV_E_event_acquisition),
112  &StCameraInterface::enableEventAcquisitionCallback, this)),
113  srv_get_image_acquisition_status_(nh_.advertiseService(
114  std::string(STSRV_G_image_acquisition_status),
115  &StCameraInterface::getImageAcquisitionStatusCallback, this)),
116  srv_get_event_acquisition_status_list_(nh_.advertiseService(
117  std::string(STSRV_G_event_acquisition_status_list),
118  &StCameraInterface::getEventAcquisitionStatusListCallback, this)),
119  srv_get_event_node_status_list_(nh_.advertiseService(
120  std::string(STSRV_G_event_node_status_list),
121  &StCameraInterface::getEventNodeStatusListCallback, this)),
122  srv_get_chunk_list_(nh_.advertiseService(
123  std::string(STSRV_G_chunk_list),
124  &StCameraInterface::getChunkListCallback, this)),
125  srv_get_trigger_list_(nh_.advertiseService(
126  std::string(STSRV_G_trigger_list),
127  &StCameraInterface::getTriggerListCallback, this)),
128  srv_get_enum_list_(nh_.advertiseService(
129  std::string(STSRV_G_enum_list),
130  &StCameraInterface::getEnumListCallback, this)),
131  srv_get_genicam_node_info_(nh_.advertiseService(
132  std::string(STSRV_G_genicam_node_info),
133  &StCameraInterface::getGenICamNodeInfoCallback, this)),
134  srv_send_soft_trigger_(nh_.advertiseService(
135  std::string(STSRV_send_soft_trigger),
136  &StCameraInterface::sendSoftTriggerCallback, this)),
137  srv_get_last_error_(nh_.advertiseService(
138  std::string(STSRV_G_last_error),
139  &StCameraInterface::getLastErrorCallback, this)),
140  bool_event_system_(false),
141  bool_event_interface_(false),
142  bool_event_device_(false),
143  bool_event_datastream_(false),
144  last_error_(0),
145  destroyed_(false)
146  {
147  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock1(mtx_acquisition_);
148  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock2(mtx_event_);
149  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock3(mtx_chunk_);
150 
151  // initialize default_event
152  std::string default_event = STMSG_event;
153  map_msg_event_.insert(std::pair<std::string, ros::Publisher>(
154  default_event,
155  nh_.advertise<omronsentech_camera::Event>(default_event, queue_size)));
156 
157  // initialize Data stream and register acquisition callback
158  tl_ds_.Reset(tl_dev_->CreateIStDataStream(0));
159  StApi::RegisterCallback(tl_ds_, *this,
160  &stcamera::StCameraInterface::eventDataStreamCB, (void *)NULL);
161 
162  // register event callback for GenTL modules Device, Interface, and System
163  StApi::RegisterCallback(tl_dev_, *this,
164  &stcamera::StCameraInterface::eventDeviceCB,
165  (void *)NULL);
166  StApi::RegisterCallback(tl_dev_->GetIStInterface(), *this,
167  &stcamera::StCameraInterface::eventInterfaceCB,
168  (void *)NULL);
169  StApi::RegisterCallback(tl_dev_->GetIStInterface()->GetIStSystem(), *this,
170  &stcamera::StCameraInterface::eventSystemCB,
171  (void *)NULL);
172 
173  // register device lost
174  if (tl_dev_->GetIStInterface()->GetIStSystem()->GetStSystemVendor() ==
175  StApi::StSystemVendor_Sentech)
176  {
177  struct StCallback stc;
178  stc.topic_name_ = default_event;
179 
180  std::string callback_node = "EventDeviceLost";
181  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr p(tl_dev_->GetLocalIStPort()->GetINodeMap());
182  GenApi::CNodePtr node_callback(p->GetNode(
183  GenICam::gcstring(callback_node.c_str())));
184  stc.cb_ = StApi::RegisterCallback(node_callback, *this,
185  &stcamera::StCameraInterface::eventGenApiNodeCB,
186  (void*)(&map_event_localdevice_), GenApi::cbPostInsideLock);
187  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr p_event_selector(p->GetNode(
188  GenICam::gcstring("EventSelector")));
189  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr p_event_selector_entry(
190  p_event_selector->GetEntryByName(GenICam::gcstring("DeviceLost")));
191  p_event_selector->SetIntValue(p_event_selector_entry->GetValue());
192  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr p_event_notif(p->GetNode(
193  GenICam::gcstring("EventNotification")));
194  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr p_event_notif_entry(
195  p_event_notif->GetEntryByName(GenICam::gcstring("On")));
196  p_event_notif->SetIntValue(p_event_notif_entry->GetValue());
197  tl_dev_->StartEventAcquisitionThread();
198  map_event_localdevice_[callback_node] = stc;
199  bool_event_device_ = true;
200  }
201 
202  // check if chunk is enabled.
203  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
204  GenApi::INode *node_sel = mp->GetNode( GenICam::gcstring("ChunkSelector"));
205  GenApi::INode *node_enable = mp->GetNode(
206  GenICam::gcstring("ChunkEnable"));
207  if (node_sel && node_enable)
208  {
209  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr chunk_selector(node_sel);
210  GenApi::NodeList_t nodelist;
211  chunk_selector->GetEntries(nodelist);
212  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
213  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
214  {
215  if (GenApi::IsAvailable(*it))
216  {
217  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
218  std::string chunk_name = enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str();
219  chunk_selector->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
220  GenApi::CBooleanPtr chunk_enable(node_enable);
221  if (GenApi::IsReadable(chunk_enable) &&
222  chunk_enable->GetValue() == true)
223  {
224  GenICam::gcstring chunk_value_name("Chunk");
225  chunk_value_name.append(chunk_name.c_str());
226  GenApi::CNodePtr p_chunk_value(mp->GetNode(
227  GenICam::gcstring(chunk_value_name)));
228  if (!p_chunk_value) continue;
229  MapChunk::iterator itm = map_chunk_.find(p_chunk_value
230  ->GetName().c_str());
231  if (itm == map_chunk_.end() || itm->second == nullptr)
232  {
233  map_chunk_[p_chunk_value->GetName().c_str()] = p_chunk_value;
234  }
235  }
236  }
237  }
238  }
239 
240  initializeCameraInfo();
241 
242  // start acquisition
243  bool_acquisition_is_started_ = true;
244  tl_ds_->StartAcquisition();
245  tl_dev_->AcquisitionStart();
246  }
247 
248  StCameraInterface::~StCameraInterface()
249  {
250  ROS_INFO("Closing device %s", camera_namespace_.c_str());
251  destroyed_ = true;
252  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx_event_);
253  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock1(mtx_acquisition_);
254 
255  // Deregister all node callback
256  MapCallback *cblist[5] =
257  {
258  &map_event_system_,
259  &map_event_interface_,
260  &map_event_localdevice_,
261  &map_event_remotedevice_,
262  &map_event_datastream_
263  };
264  for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
265  {
266  MapCallback *cb = cblist[i];
267  for (MapCallback::iterator it = cb->begin(); it != cb->end(); it++)
268  {
269  StApi::IStRegisteredCallbackReleasable *cbf = it->second.cb_;
270  cbf->Release();
271  }
272  cb->clear();
273  }
274 
275  map_msg_event_.clear();
276 
277  if (!tl_dev_->IsDeviceLost())
278  {
279  if (bool_acquisition_is_started_)
280  {
281  tl_dev_->AcquisitionStop();
282  tl_ds_->StopAcquisition();
283  bool_acquisition_is_started_ = false;
284  }
285  }
286  tl_ds_.Reset(nullptr);
287  tl_dev_.Reset(nullptr);
288  ROS_INFO("Closing device %s done.", camera_namespace_.c_str());
289  }
290 
291 
292  bool StCameraInterface::deviceIsLost()
293  {
294  return (tl_dev_->IsDeviceLost());
295  }
296 
297 
298  void StCameraInterface::eventSystemCB(StApi::IStCallbackParamBase *p,
299  void *pvContext)
300  {
301  if (destroyed_) return;
302  omronsentech_camera::Event msg;
303  msg.timestamp = ros::Time::now();
304  msg.module_name = "System";
305  if (p->GetCallbackType() == StApi::StCallbackType_GenTLEvent_SystemError)
306  {
307  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError *e = dynamic_cast<
308  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError*>(p);
309  msg.event_name = "Error";
310  msg.event_data = std::to_string(e->GetGCError()) + " " +
311  e->GetDescription().c_str();
312  }
313  publishEventDefault(msg);
314  }
315 
316  void StCameraInterface::eventInterfaceCB(StApi::IStCallbackParamBase *p,
317  void *pvContext)
318  {
319  if (destroyed_) return;
320  omronsentech_camera::Event msg;
321  msg.timestamp = ros::Time::now();
322  msg.module_name = "Interface";
323  if (p->GetCallbackType() == StApi::StCallbackType_GenTLEvent_InterfaceError)
324  {
325  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError *e = dynamic_cast<
326  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError*>(p);
327  msg.event_name = "Error";
328  msg.event_data = std::to_string(e->GetGCError()) + " " +
329  e->GetDescription().c_str();
330  }
331  publishEventDefault(msg);
332  }
333 
334  void StCameraInterface::eventDeviceCB(StApi::IStCallbackParamBase *p,
335  void *pvContext)
336  {
337  if (destroyed_) return;
338  if (tl_dev_ && tl_dev_->IsDeviceLost()) return;
339  omronsentech_camera::Event msg;
340  msg.timestamp = ros::Time::now();
341  msg.module_name = "LocalDevice";
342  if (p->GetCallbackType() == StApi::StCallbackType_GenTLEvent_DeviceError)
343  {
344  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError *e = dynamic_cast<
345  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError*>(p);
346  msg.event_name = "Error";
347  msg.event_data = std::to_string(e->GetGCError()) + " " +
348  e->GetDescription().c_str();
349  }
350  publishEventDefault(msg);
351  }
352 
353  void StCameraInterface::eventGenApiNodeCB(GenApi::INode *p, void *pvContext)
354  {
355  if (destroyed_) return;
356  MapCallback *cblist[5] =
357  {
358  &map_event_system_,
359  &map_event_interface_,
360  &map_event_localdevice_,
361  &map_event_remotedevice_,
362  &map_event_datastream_
363  };
364  std::string cbModule[5] =
365  {
366  "System", "Interface", "LocalDevice", "RemoteDevice", "DataStream"
367  };
368  MapCallback *cb = nullptr;
369  int index = -1;
370  std::string callback_node = p->GetName().c_str();
371 
372  // find the correct module
373  for (int i = 0; i < 5; i ++)
374  {
375  if (pvContext == (void*)(&(*cblist[i])))
376  {
377  cb = cblist[i];
378  index = i;
379  break;
380  }
381  }
382  if (-1 == index) return; // not found (shall never happen)
383 
384  omronsentech_camera::Event msg;
385  msg.timestamp = ros::Time::now();
386  msg.module_name = cbModule[index];
387  msg.callback_node = callback_node;
388  if (GenApi::IsReadable(p))
389  {
390  GenApi::CValuePtr pValue(p);
391  msg.event_data = pValue->ToString();
392  }
393  MapPublisher::iterator it = map_msg_event_.find(
394  ((*cb)[callback_node]).topic_name_);
395  if (it != map_msg_event_.end()) // publish to custom topic
396  {
397  it->second.publish(msg);
398  return;
399  }
400  publishEventDefault(msg); // publish to default topic
401  }
402 
403  void StCameraInterface::eventDataStreamCB(StApi::IStCallbackParamBase *p,
404  void *pvContext)
405  {
406  if (destroyed_) return;
407  if (p->GetCallbackType() ==
408  StApi::StCallbackType_GenTLEvent_DataStreamError)
409  {
410  omronsentech_camera::Event msg;
411  msg.timestamp = ros::Time::now();
412  msg.module_name = "DataStream";
413  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError *e = dynamic_cast<
414  StApi::IStCallbackParamGenTLEventError*>(p);
415  msg.event_name = "Error";
416  msg.event_data = std::to_string(e->GetGCError()) + " " +
417  e->GetDescription().c_str();
418  publishEventDefault(msg);
419  return;
420  }
421 
422  if(p->GetCallbackType() ==
423  StApi::StCallbackType_GenTLEvent_DataStreamNewBuffer)
424  {
425  try
426  {
427  StApi::CIStStreamBufferPtr p_streambuffer(tl_ds_->RetrieveBuffer(0));
428 
429  if (it_campub_.getNumSubscribers() == 0 &&
430  msg_chunk_.getNumSubscribers() == 0)
431  {
432  return;
433  }
434 
435  omronsentech_camera::Chunk chunkdata;
436  bool has_chunk = false;
437  if (map_chunk_.size() > 0)
438  {
439  has_chunk = true;
440  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr cmp(p_streambuffer->GetChunkINodeMap());
441  for (MapChunk::iterator it = map_chunk_.begin();
442  it != map_chunk_.end(); it++)
443  {
444  GenApi::INode *node = it->second;
445  if (node == nullptr) continue;
446  switch(node->GetPrincipalInterfaceType())
447  {
448  case GenApi::intfIInteger:
449  {
450  GenApi::CIntegerPtr ptr(node);
451  omronsentech_camera::ElementInt64 data;
452  data.data = ptr->GetValue();
453  data.name = it->first;
454  chunkdata.int64_list.push_back(data);
455  break;
456  }
457  case GenApi::intfIFloat:
458  {
459  GenApi::CFloatPtr ptr(node);
460  omronsentech_camera::ElementFloat64 data;
461  data.data = ptr->GetValue();
462  data.name = it->first;
463  chunkdata.float64_list.push_back(data);
464  break;
465  }
466  case GenApi::intfIBoolean:
467  {
468  GenApi::CBooleanPtr ptr(node);
469  omronsentech_camera::ElementBool data;
470  data.data = ptr->GetValue();
471  data.name = it->first;
472  chunkdata.bool_list.push_back(data);
473  break;
474  }
475  case GenApi::intfIString:
476  {
477  GenApi::CStringPtr ptr(node);
478  omronsentech_camera::ElementString data;
479  data.data = ptr->GetValue();
480  data.name = it->first;
481  chunkdata.string_list.push_back(data);
482  break;
483  }
484  case GenApi::intfIValue:
485  {
486  GenApi::CValuePtr ptr(node);
487  omronsentech_camera::ElementString data;
488  data.data = ptr->ToString();
489  data.name = it->first;
490  chunkdata.string_list.push_back(data);
491  break;
492  }
493  }
494  }
495  }
496 
497  if (p_streambuffer->GetIStStreamBufferInfo()->IsImagePresent())
498  {
499  StApi::IStImage *p_stimage = p_streambuffer->GetIStImage();
500  const StApi::EStPixelFormatNamingConvention_t ePFNC =
501  p_stimage->GetImagePixelFormat();
502 
503  std::string encoding = "";
504  switch(ePFNC)
505  {
506  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerBG8:
507  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_BGGR8;
508  break;
509  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerBG16:
510  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_BGGR16;
511  break;
512  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerGB8:
513  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_GBRG8;
514  break;
515  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerGB16:
516  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_GBRG16;
517  break;
518  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerRG8:
519  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_RGGB8;
520  break;
521  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerRG16:
522  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_RGGB16;
523  break;
524  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerGR8:
525  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_GRBG8;
526  break;
527  case StApi::StPFNC_BayerGR16:
528  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BAYER_GRBG16;
529  break;
530  case StApi::StPFNC_Mono8:
531  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO8;
532  break;
533  case StApi::StPFNC_Mono16:
534  encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO16;
535  break;
536  }
537  if (encoding.empty())
538  {
539  ROS_WARN("%s %s %d: %s: %ld: %ld x %ld: unknown encoding %d",
540  __FILE__,__func__,__LINE__,
541  camera_namespace_.c_str(),
542  p_streambuffer->GetIStStreamBufferInfo()->GetFrameID(),
543  p_stimage->GetImageWidth(),
544  p_stimage->GetImageHeight(),
545  (int)ePFNC);
546  return;
547  }
548 
549  StApi::IStPixelFormatInfo *const p_pixelformat_info =
550  StApi::GetIStPixelFormatInfo(ePFNC);
551  if (p_pixelformat_info->IsMono() || p_pixelformat_info->IsBayer())
552  {
553  //image data
554  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr image(new sensor_msgs::Image);
555  image->header.stamp = ros::Time((double)p_streambuffer
556  ->GetIStStreamBufferInfo()->GetTimestamp()/1000000.0);
557  image->width = p_stimage->GetImageWidth();
558  image->height = p_stimage->GetImageHeight();
559  image->step = p_stimage->GetImageLinePitch();
560  image->encoding = encoding;
561  image->is_bigendian = (p_streambuffer->GetIStStreamBufferInfo()
562  ->GetPixelEndianness() == GenTL::PIXELENDIANNESS_BIG);
563  const size_t buffer_size = image->height * image->step;
564  image->data.resize(buffer_size);
565  memcpy(&image->data[0], p_stimage->GetImageBuffer(), buffer_size);
566 
567  //camera info data
568  sensor_msgs::CameraInfoPtr ci(new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo(
569  cinfo_.getCameraInfo()));
570  ci->header.stamp = image->header.stamp;
571 
572  if (it_campub_.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
573  {
574  it_campub_.publish(image, ci);
575  }
576 
577  if (has_chunk && msg_chunk_.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
578  {
579  chunkdata.timestamp = image->header.stamp;
580  msg_chunk_.publish(chunkdata);
581  }
582  }
583  }
584  else
585  {
586  if (has_chunk && msg_chunk_.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
587  {
588  chunkdata.timestamp = ros::Time((double)p_streambuffer
589  ->GetIStStreamBufferInfo()->GetTimestamp()/1000000.0);
590  msg_chunk_.publish(chunkdata);
591  }
592  }
593  }
594  catch(const StApi::CStGenTLErrorException &x)
595  {
596  ROS_ERROR("%s %s %d: \n\t%s GenTL error when retrieving payload: %d %s",
597  __FILE__,__func__,__LINE__,
598  camera_namespace_.c_str(), x.GetError(), x.GetDescription());
599  }
600  catch(GenICam::GenericException &x)
601  {
602  ROS_ERROR("%s %s %d: \n\t%s GenICam error when retrieving payload: %s",
603  __FILE__,__func__,__LINE__,
604  camera_namespace_.c_str(), x.GetDescription());
605  }
606  }
607  }
608 
609  // read node
610  bool StCameraInterface::readNodeCallback(
611  omronsentech_camera::ReadNode::Request &req,
612  omronsentech_camera::ReadNode::Response &res)
613  {
614  try
615  {
616  GenApi::INodeMap* mp = getNodeMap(req.module_name);
617  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
618 
619  GenApi::INode *node = mp->GetNode(
620  GenICam::gcstring(req.node_name.c_str()));
621  CHECK_NULLPTR(node, NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
622 
623  res.interface_type = GenApi::GetInterfaceName(node).c_str();
624  switch(node->GetPrincipalInterfaceType())
625  {
626  case GenApi::intfIInteger:
627  {
628  GenApi::CIntegerPtr ptr(node);
629  res.value = ptr->ToString();
630  return true;
631  }
632  case GenApi::intfIBoolean:
633  {
634  GenApi::CBooleanPtr ptr(node);
635  res.value = ptr->ToString();
636  return true;
637  }
638  case GenApi::intfIFloat:
639  {
640  GenApi::CFloatPtr ptr(node);
641  res.value = ptr->ToString();
642  return true;
643  }
644  case GenApi::intfIString:
645  {
646  GenApi::CStringPtr ptr(node);
647  res.value = ptr->GetValue().c_str();
648  return true;
649  }
650  case GenApi::intfIRegister:
651  {
652  GenApi::CRegisterPtr ptr(node);
653  res.value = ptr->ToString();
654  return true;
655  }
656  case GenApi::intfICategory:
657  {
658  GenApi::CCategoryPtr ptr(node);
659  res.value = ptr->ToString();
660  return true;
661  }
662  case GenApi::intfIEnumeration:
663  {
664  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr ptr(node);
665  res.value = ptr->ToString();
666  return true;
667  }
668  default:
669  {
670  RETURN_ERR(NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
671  }
672  }
673  }
674  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
675  }
676

690  GenApi::CBooleanPtr ptr(node);
691  res.value = ptr->GetValue();
692  return true;
693  }
694  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
695  }

777 
778  // write node
779  bool StCameraInterface::writeNodeCallback(
780  omronsentech_camera::WriteNode::Request &req,
781  omronsentech_camera::WriteNode::Response &res)
782  {
783  try
784  {
785  GenApi::INodeMap *mp = getNodeMap(req.module_name);
786  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
787 
788  GenApi::INode *node = mp->GetNode(
789  GenICam::gcstring(req.node_name.c_str()));
790  CHECK_NULLPTR(node, NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
791 
792  switch(node->GetPrincipalInterfaceType())
793  {
794  case GenApi::intfIInteger:
795  {
796  GenApi::CIntegerPtr ptr(node);
797  ptr->SetValue(std::stoi(req.value));
798  return true;
799  }
800  case GenApi::intfIBoolean:
801  {
802  GenApi::CBooleanPtr ptr(node);
803  std::string true_str = "true";
804  std::string false_str = "false";
805  bool true_value = false;
806  bool false_value = false;
807  if (req.value.size() == true_str.size())
808  {
809  true_value = true;
810  for (std::string::const_iterator c1 = true_str.begin(),
811  c2 = req.value.begin(); c1 != true_str.end(); ++c1, ++c2)
812  {
813  if (tolower(*c1) != tolower(*c2))
814  {
815  true_value = false;
816  break;
817  }
818  }
819  if (true_value)
820  {
821  ptr->SetValue(true);
822  return true;
823  }
824  }
825  if (req.value.size() == false_str.size())
826  {
827  false_value = true;
828  for (std::string::const_iterator c1 = false_str.begin(),
829  c2 = req.value.begin(); c1 != false_str.end(); ++c1, ++c2)
830  {
831  if (tolower(*c1) != tolower(*c2))
832  {
833  false_value = false;
834  break;
835  }
836  }
837  if (false_value)
838  {
839  ptr->SetValue(false);
840  return true;
841  }
842  }
843  RETURN_ERR(NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
844  }
845  case GenApi::intfIFloat:
846  {
847  GenApi::CFloatPtr ptr(node);
848  ptr->SetValue(std::stod(req.value));
849  return true;
850  }
851  case GenApi::intfIString:
852  {
853  GenApi::CStringPtr ptr(node);
854  ptr->SetValue(GenICam::gcstring(req.value.c_str()));
855  return true;
856  }
857  case GenApi::intfIEnumeration:
858  {
859  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr ptr(node);
860  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(
861  ptr->GetEntryByName(GenICam::gcstring(req.value.c_str())));
862  ptr->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
863  return true;
864  }
865  default:
866  {
867  RETURN_ERR(NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
868  }
869  }
870  }
871  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
872  }
873 
874  bool StCameraInterface::writeNodeBoolCallback(
875  omronsentech_camera::WriteNodeBool::Request &req,
876  omronsentech_camera::WriteNodeBool::Response &res)
877  {
878  try

886 
887  GenApi::CBooleanPtr ptr(node);
888  ptr->SetValue(req.value);
889  return true;
890  }
891  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
892  }

1000  bool StCameraInterface::executeNodeCallback(

1002  omronsentech_camera::ExecuteNode::Response &res)
1003  {
1004  try
1005  {

1007  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
1008

1014  ptr->Execute();
1015  return true;
1016  }
1017  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1018  }
1019 
1020  // enable
1021  bool StCameraInterface::enableChunkCallback(
1022  omronsentech_camera::EnableChunk::Request &req,
1023  omronsentech_camera::EnableChunk::Response &res)
1024  {
1025  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock1(mtx_acquisition_);
1026  if (bool_acquisition_is_started_)
1027  {
1028  RETURN_ERR(ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR, ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR_STR);
1029  }
1030 
1031  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock2(mtx_chunk_);
1032 
1033  try
1034  {
1035  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
1036 
1037  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr chunk_selector(mp->GetNode(
1038  GenICam::gcstring("ChunkSelector")));
1039  GenApi::CBooleanPtr chunk_enable(mp->GetNode(
1040  GenICam::gcstring("ChunkEnable")));
1041  GenApi::CBooleanPtr chunk_active(mp->GetNode(
1042  GenICam::gcstring("ChunkModeActive")));
1043  if (!chunk_selector.IsValid() || !chunk_enable.IsValid() ||
1044  !chunk_active.IsValid())
1045  {
1046  RETURN_ERR(CHUNK_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, CHUNK_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1047  }
1048 
1049  if (req.chunk_name.empty()) // All chunks
1050  {
1051  GenApi::NodeList_t chunk_list;
1052  chunk_selector->GetEntries(chunk_list);
1053  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator itr = chunk_list.begin();
1054  itr != chunk_list.end(); ++itr)
1055  {
1056  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr chunk_list_entry(*itr);
1057  if (GenApi::IsAvailable(chunk_list_entry))
1058  {
1059  chunk_selector->SetIntValue(chunk_list_entry->GetValue());
1060  if (GenApi::IsWritable(chunk_enable))
1061  {
1062  chunk_enable->SetValue(req.value);
1063  GenApi::CNodePtr chunk_value_node(mp->GetNode(
1064  "Chunk" + chunk_list_entry->GetSymbolic()));
1065  if (chunk_value_node && req.value)
1066  {
1067  MapChunk::iterator itm = map_chunk_.find(chunk_value_node
1068  ->GetName().c_str());
1069  if (itm == map_chunk_.end() || itm->second == nullptr)
1070  {
1071  map_chunk_[chunk_value_node->GetName().c_str()] =
1072  chunk_value_node;
1073  }
1074  }
1075  }
1076  }
1077  }
1078  if (!req.value)
1079  {
1080  map_chunk_.clear();
1081  }
1082  chunk_active->SetValue(req.value);
1083  }
1084  else
1085  {
1086  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr chunk_list_entry(chunk_selector
1087  ->GetEntryByName(GenICam::gcstring(req.chunk_name.c_str())));
1088  if (!chunk_list_entry.IsValid() ||
1089  !GenApi::IsReadable(chunk_list_entry))
1090  {
1091  RETURN_ERR(CHUNK_NAME_ERROR, CHUNK_NAME_ERROR_STR);
1092  }
1093  chunk_selector->SetIntValue(chunk_list_entry->GetValue());
1094  if (GenApi::IsWritable(chunk_enable))
1095  {
1096  chunk_enable->SetValue(req.value);
1097 
1098  GenICam::gcstring chunk_value_name("Chunk");
1099  chunk_value_name.append(req.chunk_name.c_str());
1100  GenApi::CNodePtr chunk_value_node(mp->GetNode(chunk_value_name));
1101  if (chunk_value_node)
1102  {
1103  MapChunk::iterator itm = map_chunk_.find(chunk_value_node
1104  ->GetName().c_str());
1105  if (req.value)
1106  {
1107  if (itm == map_chunk_.end() || itm->second == nullptr)
1108  {
1109  map_chunk_[chunk_value_node->GetName().c_str()] =
1110  chunk_value_node;
1111  }
1112  if (chunk_active->GetValue() == false)
1113  {
1114  chunk_active->SetValue(req.value);
1115  }
1116  }
1117  }
1118  }
1119  else
1120  {
1121  RETURN_ERR(CHUNK_NAME_ERROR, CHUNK_NAME_ERROR_STR);
1122  }
1123  }
1124  return true;
1125  }
1126  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1127  }
1128 
1129  bool StCameraInterface::enableTriggerCallback(
1130  omronsentech_camera::EnableTrigger::Request &req,
1131  omronsentech_camera::EnableTrigger::Response &res)
1132  {
1133  try
1134  {
1135  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
1136 
1137  // Node for selector and source
1138  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr trigger_selector(mp->GetNode(
1139  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerSelector")));
1140  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr trigger_source(mp->GetNode(
1141  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerSource")));
1142  if (!trigger_selector.IsValid() || !trigger_source.IsValid())
1143  {
1144  RETURN_ERR(TRIGGER_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR,TRIGGER_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1145  }
1146  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr trigger_selector_entry(
1147  trigger_selector->GetEntryByName(
1148  GenICam::gcstring(req.trigger_selector.c_str())));
1149  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr trigger_source_entry(
1150  trigger_source->GetEntryByName(
1151  GenICam::gcstring(req.trigger_source.c_str())));
1152  if (!trigger_selector_entry.IsValid() || !trigger_source_entry.IsValid())
1153  {
1154  RETURN_ERR(TRIGGER_NAME_ERROR,TRIGGER_NAME_ERROR_STR);
1155  }
1156 
1157  // set selector
1158  if (trigger_selector->GetIntValue() != trigger_selector_entry->GetValue())
1159  {
1160  trigger_selector->SetIntValue(trigger_selector_entry->GetValue());
1161  }
1162 
1163  // set source
1164  if (trigger_source->GetIntValue() != trigger_source_entry->GetValue())
1165  {
1166  trigger_source->SetIntValue(trigger_source_entry->GetValue());
1167  }
1168 
1169  // set delay only if supported
1170  GenApi::CFloatPtr trigger_delay = mp->GetNode(
1171  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerDelay"));
1172  if (trigger_delay.IsValid())
1173  {
1174  if (trigger_delay->GetValue() != req.trigger_delayus)
1175  {
1176  trigger_delay->SetValue(req.trigger_delayus);
1177  }
1178  }
1179 
1180  // set mode
1181  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr trigger_mode = mp->GetNode(
1182  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerMode"));
1183  if (req.value == true)
1184  {
1185  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr trigger_mode_entry(
1186  trigger_mode->GetEntryByName(GenICam::gcstring("On")));
1187  if (trigger_mode->GetIntValue() != trigger_mode_entry->GetValue())
1188  {
1189  trigger_mode->SetIntValue(trigger_mode_entry->GetValue());
1190  }
1191  }
1192  else
1193  {
1194  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr trigger_mode_entry(
1195  trigger_mode->GetEntryByName(GenICam::gcstring("Off")));
1196  if (trigger_mode->GetIntValue() != trigger_mode_entry->GetValue())
1197  {
1198  trigger_mode->SetIntValue(trigger_mode_entry->GetValue());
1199  }
1200  }
1201  return true;
1202  }
1203  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1204  }
1205 
1206  bool StCameraInterface::enableEventNodeCallback(
1207  omronsentech_camera::EnableEventNode::Request &req,
1208  omronsentech_camera::EnableEventNode::Response &res)
1209  {
1210  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx_event_);
1211  try
1212  {
1213  GenApi::INodeMap *mp = getNodeMap(req.module_name);
1214  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
1215 
1216  GenApi::INode *nodeCallback = mp->GetNode(
1217  GenICam::gcstring(req.callback_node.c_str()));
1218  CHECK_NULLPTR(nodeCallback, NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
1219 
1220  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr event_selector(mp->GetNode(
1221  GenICam::gcstring("EventSelector")));
1222  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr event_notif(mp->GetNode(
1223  GenICam::gcstring("EventNotification")));
1224  if (!event_selector.IsValid() || !event_notif.IsValid() ||
1225  !GenApi::IsWritable(event_selector))
1226  {
1227  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR,EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1228  }
1229 
1230  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(
1231  event_selector->GetEntryByName(
1232  GenICam::gcstring(req.node_name.c_str())));
1233  if (!enum_entry.IsValid())
1234  {
1235  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_NAME_ERROR, EVENT_NAME_ERROR_STR);
1236  }
1237  event_selector->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
1238  GenApi::CNodePtr node_callback(nodeCallback);
1239  GenICam::gcstring value = req.value ? "On" : "Off";
1240  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr event_notif_entry(
1241  event_notif->GetEntryByName(value));
1242  if (!GenApi::IsWritable(event_notif))
1243  {
1244  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR,EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1245  }
1246  event_notif->SetIntValue(event_notif_entry->GetValue());
1247 
1248  MapCallback *cb = getCallbackMap(req.module_name);
1249  MapCallback::iterator it = cb->find(req.callback_node);
1250  std::string topic_name = STMSG_event;
1251  if (!req.event_topic_name.empty())
1252  {
1253  topic_name += "/" + req.event_topic_name;
1254  }
1255 
1256  if (req.value) // set enabled = true
1257  {
1258  if (it == cb->end()) // not found in registered list
1259  {
1260  MapPublisher::iterator itpub = map_msg_event_.find(topic_name);
1261  if (itpub == map_msg_event_.end())
1262  {
1263  map_msg_event_.insert(std::pair<std::string, ros::Publisher>(
1264  topic_name,
1265  nh_.advertise<omronsentech_camera::Event>(topic_name,
1266  queue_size_)));
1267  }
1268  struct StCallback stc;
1269  stc.topic_name_ = topic_name;
1270  stc.cb_ = StApi::RegisterCallback(node_callback, *this,
1271  &stcamera::StCameraInterface::eventGenApiNodeCB,
1272  (void*)(&(*cb)), GenApi::cbPostInsideLock);
1273  (*cb)[req.callback_node] = stc;
1274  return true;
1275  }
1276  // already registered
1277  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_ALREADY_ON_ERROR, EVENT_ALREADY_ON_ERROR_STR);
1278  }
1279 
1280  // set enabled = false
1281  if (it != cb->end()) // found in registered list
1282  {
1283  StApi::IStRegisteredCallbackReleasable *cbf = it->second.cb_;
1284  cbf->Release();
1285  cb->erase(it);
1286  if (topic_name.compare(std::string(camera_namespace_ +
1287  "/" + STMSG_event)) != 0) // not using default event topic
1288  {
1289  // remove publisher if no other event callback is using the topic
1290  MapCallback *cblist[5] =
1291  {
1292  &map_event_system_,
1293  &map_event_interface_,
1294  &map_event_localdevice_,
1295  &map_event_remotedevice_,
1296  &map_event_datastream_
1297  };
1298  for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
1299  {
1300  for (MapCallback::iterator itcb = (*cblist[i]).begin();
1301  itcb != (*cblist[i]).end(); itcb++)
1302  { // if other event is using the topic, do nothing and return.
1303  if (itcb->second.topic_name_.compare(topic_name) == 0)
1304  {
1305  return true;
1306  }
1307  }
1308  }
1309  MapPublisher::iterator itpub = map_msg_event_.find(topic_name);
1310  if (itpub != map_msg_event_.end())
1311  {
1312  map_msg_event_.erase(itpub);
1313  }
1314  }
1315  return true;
1316  }
1317  // not found in registered list
1318  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR, EVENT_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR_STR);
1319  }
1320  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1321  }
1322 
1323  bool StCameraInterface::enableImageAcquisitionCallback(
1324  omronsentech_camera::EnableImageAcquisition::Request &req,
1325  omronsentech_camera::EnableImageAcquisition::Response &res)
1326  {
1327  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx_acquisition_);
1328  try
1329  {
1330  if (req.value == true)
1331  {
1332  //already started, return directly
1333  if (bool_acquisition_is_started_)
1334  {
1335  RETURN_ERR(ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR, ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR_STR);
1336  }
1337 
1338  initializeCameraInfo();
1339  tl_ds_->StartAcquisition();
1340  tl_dev_->AcquisitionStart();
1341  bool_acquisition_is_started_ = true;
1342  return true;
1343  }
1344 
1345  if (bool_acquisition_is_started_)
1346  {
1347  tl_dev_->AcquisitionStop();
1348  tl_ds_->StopAcquisition();
1349  bool_acquisition_is_started_ = false;
1350  return true;
1351  }
1352  RETURN_ERR(ACQ_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR, ACQ_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR_STR);
1353  }
1354  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1355  }
1356 
1357  bool StCameraInterface::enableEventAcquisitionCallback(
1358  omronsentech_camera::EnableEventAcquisition::Request &req,
1359  omronsentech_camera::EnableEventAcquisition::Response &res)
1360  {
1361  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx_event_);
1362  try
1363  {
1364  StApi::IStEventCtrl *event_control = nullptr;
1365  bool *event_value = nullptr;
1366  if (req.module_name.compare("System") == 0)
1367  {
1368  event_control = dynamic_cast<StApi::IStEventCtrl *>(
1369  tl_dev_->GetIStInterface()->GetIStSystem());
1370  event_value = &bool_event_system_;
1371  }
1372  else if (req.module_name.compare("Interface") == 0)
1373  {
1374  event_control = dynamic_cast<StApi::IStEventCtrl *>(
1375  tl_dev_->GetIStInterface());
1376  event_value = &bool_event_interface_;
1377  }
1378  else if (req.module_name.compare("LocalDevice") == 0)
1379  {
1380  event_control = dynamic_cast<StApi::IStEventCtrl *>(&(*tl_dev_));
1381  //(StApi::IStDevice*)tl_dev_);
1382  event_value = &bool_event_device_;
1383  }
1384  else if (req.module_name.compare("DataStream") == 0)
1385  {
1386  event_control = dynamic_cast<StApi::IStEventCtrl *>(&(*tl_ds_));
1387  event_value = &bool_event_datastream_;
1388  }
1389  else
1390  {
1391  RETURN_ERR(MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
1392  }
1393 
1394  if (event_control != nullptr)
1395  {
1396  if (req.value == true) // set enable
1397  {
1398  if (req.value == *event_value)
1399  {
1400  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_ALREADY_ON_ERROR, EVENT_ALREADY_ON_ERROR_STR);
1401  }
1402  event_control->StartEventAcquisitionThread();
1403  *event_value = true;
1404  return true;
1405  }
1406 
1407  // set disable
1408  if (req.value == *event_value)
1409  {
1410  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR, EVENT_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR_STR);
1411  }
1412  event_control->StopEventAcquisitionThread();
1413  *event_value = false;
1414  return true;
1415  }
1416  }
1417  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1418  }
1419 
1420  // get
1421  bool StCameraInterface::getImageAcquisitionStatusCallback(
1422  omronsentech_camera::GetImageAcquisitionStatus::Request &req,
1423  omronsentech_camera::GetImageAcquisitionStatus::Response &res)
1424  {
1425  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx_acquisition_);
1426  res.value = bool_acquisition_is_started_;
1427  return true;
1428  }
1429 
1430  bool StCameraInterface::getEventAcquisitionStatusListCallback(
1431  omronsentech_camera::GetEventAcquisitionStatusList::Request &req,
1432  omronsentech_camera::GetEventAcquisitionStatusList::Response &res)
1433  {
1434  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx_event_);
1435  res.module_name_list.push_back("System");
1436  res.module_name_list.push_back("Interface");
1437  res.module_name_list.push_back("LocalDevice");
1438  res.module_name_list.push_back("RemoteDevice");
1439  res.module_name_list.push_back("DataStream");
1440  res.enabled_list.push_back(bool_event_system_);
1441  res.enabled_list.push_back(bool_event_interface_);
1442  res.enabled_list.push_back(bool_event_device_); //Local == Remote
1443  res.enabled_list.push_back(bool_event_device_); //Remote == Local
1444  res.enabled_list.push_back(bool_event_datastream_);
1445  return true;
1446  }
1447 
1448  bool StCameraInterface::getEventNodeStatusListCallback(
1449  omronsentech_camera::GetEventNodeStatusList::Request &req,
1450  omronsentech_camera::GetEventNodeStatusList::Response &res)
1451  {
1452  GenApi::INodeMap *mp = getNodeMap(req.module_name);
1453  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
1454 
1455  try
1456  {
1457  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr event_selector(mp->GetNode(
1458  GenICam::gcstring("EventSelector")));
1459  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr event_notif(mp->GetNode(
1460  GenICam::gcstring("EventNotification")));
1461  if (!event_selector.IsValid() || !event_notif.IsValid())
1462  {
1463  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1464  }
1465  if (GenApi::IsReadable(event_selector))
1466  {
1467  GenApi::NodeList_t nodelist;
1468  event_selector->GetEntries(nodelist);
1469  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
1470  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
1471  {
1472  if (!GenApi::IsAvailable(*it)) continue;
1473 
1474  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
1475  event_selector->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
1476  omronsentech_camera::GenICamEvent genicam_event;
1477  genicam_event.name = std::string(enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str());
1478  genicam_event.enabled = (event_notif->GetCurrentEntry()
1479  ->GetSymbolic().compare("On") == 0 ? true : false);
1480 
1481  //list the callback node:
1482  std::string nodeData = "Event" + genicam_event.name + "Data";
1483  GenApi::CNodePtr event_category_node(mp->GetNode(
1484  GenICam::gcstring(nodeData.c_str())));
1485  if (event_category_node.IsValid())
1486  {
1487  MapCallback *cb = getCallbackMap(req.module_name);
1488  GenApi::FeatureList_t features;
1489  GenApi::CCategoryPtr event_category(event_category_node);
1490  event_category->GetFeatures(features);
1491  for (GenApi::FeatureList_t::iterator it = features.begin();
1492  it != features.end(); it++)
1493  {
1494  GenApi::INode *node = (*it)->GetNode();
1495  if (!GenApi::IsImplemented(node)) continue;
1496  std::string cb_name = node->GetName().c_str();
1497  genicam_event.callback_node_list.push_back(cb_name.c_str());
1498  MapCallback::iterator itmap = cb->find(cb_name);
1499  if (itmap == cb->end() || itmap->second.cb_ == nullptr)
1500  {
1501  genicam_event.callback_enabled_list.push_back(false);
1502  }
1503  else
1504  {
1505  genicam_event.callback_enabled_list.push_back(true);
1506  }
1507  }
1508  }
1509  res.event_node_list.push_back(genicam_event);
1510  }
1511  }
1512  return true;
1513  }
1514  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1515  }
1516 
1517  bool StCameraInterface::getChunkListCallback(
1518  omronsentech_camera::GetChunkList::Request &req,
1519  omronsentech_camera::GetChunkList::Response &res)
1520  {
1521  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock1(mtx_acquisition_);
1522  if (bool_acquisition_is_started_)
1523  {
1524  RETURN_ERR(ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR,ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR_STR);
1525  }
1526 
1527  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock2(mtx_chunk_);
1528  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
1529  try
1530  {
1531  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr chunk_selector = mp->GetNode(
1532  GenICam::gcstring("ChunkSelector"));
1533  GenApi::NodeList_t nodelist;
1534  if (!chunk_selector.IsValid())
1535  {
1536  RETURN_ERR(CHUNK_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR,CHUNK_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1537  }
1538  chunk_selector->GetEntries(nodelist);
1539  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
1540  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
1541  {
1542  if (GenApi::IsAvailable(*it))
1543  {
1544  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
1545  res.chunk_name_list.push_back(
1546  std::string(enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str()));
1547  chunk_selector->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
1548  GenApi::CBooleanPtr enablePtr = mp->GetNode(
1549  GenICam::gcstring("ChunkEnable"));
1550  if (enablePtr.IsValid())
1551  {
1552  res.chunk_enabled_list.push_back(
1553  enablePtr->GetValue() ? true : false);
1554  }
1555  }
1556  }
1557  return true;
1558  }
1559  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1560  }
1561 
1562  bool StCameraInterface::getTriggerListCallback(
1563  omronsentech_camera::GetTriggerList::Request &req,
1564  omronsentech_camera::GetTriggerList::Response &res)
1565  {
1566  try
1567  {
1568  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
1569 
1570  // Node for selector and source
1571  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr enum_sel = mp->GetNode(
1572  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerSelector"));
1573  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr enum_src = mp->GetNode(
1574  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerSource"));
1575  if (!enum_sel.IsValid() || !enum_src.IsValid())
1576  {
1577  RETURN_ERR(EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR, EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR_STR);
1578  }
1579 
1580  // Iterate selector
1581  GenApi::NodeList_t nodelist;
1582  enum_sel->GetEntries(nodelist);
1583  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
1584  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
1585  {
1586  if (!GenApi::IsAvailable(*it)) continue;
1587  // Get selector
1588  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
1589  res.trigger_selector_list.push_back(
1590  std::string(enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str()));
1591  enum_sel->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
1592 
1593  // Get mode
1594  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr trigger_mode = mp->GetNode(
1595  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerMode"));
1596  if (trigger_mode.IsValid())
1597  {
1598  res.trigger_mode_list.push_back(trigger_mode->GetCurrentEntry()
1599  ->GetSymbolic().compare("On") == 0 ? true : false);
1600  }
1601  else
1602  {
1603  res.trigger_mode_list.push_back(false);
1604  }
1605 
1606  // Get delayus
1607  GenApi::CFloatPtr trigger_delay = mp->GetNode(
1608  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerDelay"));
1609  if (trigger_mode.IsValid() && GenApi::IsReadable(trigger_delay))
1610  {
1611  res.trigger_delayus_list.push_back(trigger_delay->GetValue());
1612  }
1613  else
1614  {
1615  res.trigger_delayus_list.push_back(0);
1616  }
1617  }
1618 
1619  // Iterate source
1620  nodelist.clear();
1621  enum_src->GetEntries(nodelist);
1622  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
1623  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
1624  {
1625  if (!GenApi::IsAvailable(*it)) continue;
1626  // Get source
1627  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
1628  res.trigger_source_list.push_back(
1629  std::string(enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str()));
1630  }
1631  return true;
1632  }
1633  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1634  }
1635 
1636  bool StCameraInterface::getEnumListCallback(
1637  omronsentech_camera::GetEnumList::Request &req,
1638  omronsentech_camera::GetEnumList::Response &res)
1639  {
1640  try
1641  {
1642  GenApi::INodeMap *mp = getNodeMap(req.module_name);
1643  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
1644 
1645  GenApi::INode *node = mp->GetNode(
1646  GenICam::gcstring(req.node_name.c_str()));
1647  CHECK_NULLPTR(node, NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
1648 
1649  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr ptr(node);
1650  GenApi::NodeList_t nodelist;
1651  ptr->GetEntries(nodelist);
1652  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
1653  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
1654  {
1655  if (GenApi::IsAvailable(*it))
1656  {
1657  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
1658  res.enum_value_int_list.push_back(enum_entry->GetValue());
1659  res.enum_value_str_list.push_back(
1660  std::string(enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str()));
1661  }
1662  }
1663  return true;
1664  }
1665  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1666  }
1667 
1668  bool StCameraInterface::getGenICamNodeInfoCallback(
1669  omronsentech_camera::GetGenICamNodeInfo::Request &req,
1670  omronsentech_camera::GetGenICamNodeInfo::Response &res)
1671  {
1672  try
1673  {
1674  GenApi::INodeMap *mp = getNodeMap(req.module_name);
1675  CHECK_NULLPTR(mp, MODULE_ERROR, MODULE_ERROR_STR);
1676 
1677  GenApi::INode *node = mp->GetNode(
1678  GenICam::gcstring(req.node_name.c_str()));
1679  CHECK_NULLPTR(node, NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
1680 
1681  //string name
1682  res.name = node->GetName().c_str();
1683 
1684  //string description
1685  res.description = node->GetDescription().c_str();
1686 
1687  //string name_space
1688  GenApi::ENameSpace genicam_namespace = node->GetNameSpace();
1689  switch(genicam_namespace)
1690  {
1691  case(GenApi::Custom):
1692  res.name_space = "Custom";
1693  break;
1694  case(GenApi::Standard):
1695  res.name_space= "Standard";
1696  break;
1697  case(GenApi::_UndefinedNameSpace):
1698  default:
1699  res.name_space = "";
1700  break;
1701  }
1702 
1703  //string interface_type
1704  res.interface_type = GenApi::GetInterfaceName(node).c_str();
1705 
1706  //string access_mode
1707  GenApi::EAccessMode genicam_accessmode = node->GetAccessMode();
1708  switch(genicam_accessmode)
1709  {
1710  case(GenApi::NI):
1711  res.access_mode = "Not implemented";
1712  break;
1713  case(GenApi::NA):
1714  res.access_mode = "Not available";
1715  break;
1716  case(GenApi::WO):
1717  res.access_mode = "Write Only";
1718  break;
1719  case(GenApi::RO):
1720  res.access_mode = "Read Only";
1721  break;
1722  case(GenApi::RW):
1723  res.access_mode = "Read and Write";
1724  break;
1725  case(GenApi::_CycleDetectAccesMode):
1726  res.access_mode = "used internally for AccessMode cycle detection";
1727  break;
1728  case(GenApi::_UndefinedAccesMode):
1729  default:
1730  res.access_mode = "";
1731  break;
1732  }
1733 
1734  //string is_cachable
1735  GenApi::EYesNo genicam_accessmode_cacheable =
1736  node->IsAccessModeCacheable();
1737  switch(genicam_accessmode_cacheable)
1738  {
1739  case(GenApi::Yes):
1740  res.is_cachable = "Yes";
1741  break;
1742  case(GenApi::No):
1743  res.is_cachable = "No";
1744  break;
1745  case(GenApi::_UndefinedYesNo):
1746  default:
1747  res.is_cachable = "";
1748  break;
1749  }
1750 
1751  //string visibility
1752  GenApi::EVisibility genicam_visibility = node->GetVisibility();
1753  switch(genicam_visibility)
1754  {
1755  case(GenApi::Beginner):
1756  res.visibility = "Beginner";
1757  break;
1758  case(GenApi::Expert):
1759  res.visibility = "Expert";
1760  break;
1761  case(GenApi::Guru):
1762  res.visibility = "Guru";
1763  break;
1764  case(GenApi::Invisible):
1765  res.visibility = "Invisible";
1766  break;
1767  case(GenApi::_UndefinedVisibility):
1768  default:
1769  res.visibility = "";
1770  }
1771 
1772  //string caching_mode
1773  GenApi::ECachingMode genicam_caching_mode = node->GetCachingMode();
1774  switch(genicam_caching_mode)
1775  {
1776  case(GenApi::NoCache):
1777  res.caching_mode = "Does not use cache";
1778  break;
1779  case(GenApi::WriteThrough):
1780  res.caching_mode = "Write to cache and register";
1781  break;
1782  case(GenApi::WriteAround):
1783  res.caching_mode = "Write to register, write to cache on read";
1784  break;
1785  case(GenApi::_UndefinedCachingMode):
1786  default:
1787  res.caching_mode = "";
1788  }
1789 
1790  //bool is_streamable
1791  res.is_streamable = node->IsStreamable() ? true : false;
1792 
1793  if (genicam_accessmode == GenApi::NA)
1794  {
1795  return true;
1796  }
1797 
1798  if (genicam_accessmode == GenApi::RW || genicam_accessmode == GenApi::RO)
1799  {
1800  switch(node->GetPrincipalInterfaceType())
1801  {
1802  case GenApi::intfIValue:
1803  {
1804  GenApi::CValuePtr ptr(node);
1805  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1806  break;
1807  }
1808  case GenApi::intfIInteger:
1809  {
1810  GenApi::CIntegerPtr ptr(node);
1811  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1812  res.min_value = std::to_string(ptr->GetMin());
1813  res.max_value = std::to_string(ptr->GetMax());
1814  res.unit = ptr->GetUnit().c_str();
1815  try
1816  {
1817  res.increment = std::to_string(ptr->GetInc());
1818  }
1819  catch(...)
1820  {
1821  res.increment = "";
1822  }
1823  break;
1824  }
1825  case GenApi::intfIBoolean:
1826  {
1827  GenApi::CBooleanPtr ptr(node);
1828  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1829  break;
1830  }
1831  case GenApi::intfICommand:
1832  {
1833  break;
1834  }
1835  case GenApi::intfIFloat:
1836  {
1837  GenApi::CFloatPtr ptr(node);
1838  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1839  res.min_value = std::to_string(ptr->GetMin());
1840  res.max_value = std::to_string(ptr->GetMax());
1841  res.unit = ptr->GetUnit().c_str();
1842  break;
1843  }
1844  case GenApi::intfIString:
1845  {
1846  GenApi::CStringPtr ptr(node);
1847  res.current_value = ptr->GetValue().c_str();
1848  break;
1849  }
1850  case GenApi::intfIRegister:
1851  {
1852  GenApi::CRegisterPtr ptr(node);
1853  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1854  break;
1855  }
1856  case GenApi::intfICategory:
1857  {
1858  GenApi::CCategoryPtr ptr(node);
1859  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1860  GenApi::FeatureList_t features;
1861  ptr->GetFeatures(features);
1862  for (GenApi::FeatureList_t::iterator it = features.begin();
1863  it != features.end(); it++)
1864  {
1865  GenApi::INode *node = (*it)->GetNode();
1866  if (!GenApi::IsImplemented(node)) continue;
1867  res.child_node_list.push_back(node->GetName().c_str());
1868  }
1869  break;
1870  }
1871  case GenApi::intfIEnumeration:
1872  {
1873  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr ptr(node);
1874  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1875  GenApi::NodeList_t nodelist;
1876  ptr->GetEntries(nodelist);
1877  for (GenApi::NodeList_t::iterator it = nodelist.begin();
1878  it != nodelist.end(); it++)
1879  {
1880  if (GenApi::IsAvailable(*it))
1881  {
1882  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(*it);
1883  res.enum_value_int_list.push_back(enum_entry->GetValue());
1884  res.enum_value_str_list.push_back(
1885  std::string(enum_entry->GetSymbolic().c_str()));
1886  }
1887  }
1888  break;
1889  }
1890  case GenApi::intfIEnumEntry:
1891  {
1892  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr ptr(node);
1893  res.current_value = ptr->ToString();
1894  break;
1895  }
1896  case GenApi::intfIPort:
1897  {
1898  break;
1899  }
1900  default:
1901  {
1902  RETURN_ERR(NODE_ERROR, NODE_ERROR_STR);
1903  }
1904  }
1905  }
1906  return true;
1907  }
1908  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1909  }
1910 
1911  bool StCameraInterface::sendSoftTriggerCallback(
1912  omronsentech_camera::SendSoftTrigger::Request &req,
1913  omronsentech_camera::SendSoftTrigger::Response &res)
1914  {
1915  try
1916  {
1917  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
1918 
1919  //set selector
1920  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr enum_node = mp->GetNode(
1921  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerSelector"));
1922  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr enum_entry(enum_node->GetEntryByName(
1923  GenICam::gcstring(req.trigger_selector.c_str())));
1924  if (enum_node->GetIntValue() != enum_entry->GetValue())
1925  {
1926  enum_node->SetIntValue(enum_entry->GetValue());
1927  }
1928 
1929  //send
1930  GenApi::CCommandPtr cmd = mp->GetNode(
1931  GenICam::gcstring("TriggerSoftware"));
1932  cmd->Execute();
1933  return true;
1934  }
1935  CATCH_COMMON_ERR();
1936  }
1937 
1938  bool StCameraInterface::getLastErrorCallback(
1939  omronsentech_camera::GetLastError::Request &req,
1940  omronsentech_camera::GetLastError::Response &res)
1941  {
1942  res.error_code = last_error_;
1943  switch(last_error_)
1944  {
1945  case 0:
1946  res.description = "No error.";
1947  return true;
1948  case UNKNOWN_ERROR:
1949  res.description = "Unknown exception occured.";
1950  return true;
1951  case GENICAM_ERROR:
1952  res.description = "Error occured when accessing GenICam code. If image acquisition is enabled, try to disable image acquisition before accessing the node.";
1953  return true;
1954  case MODULE_ERROR:
1955  res.description = "Module name is invalid. Check the list of "
1956  "module name by calling service 'get_module_list'";
1957  return true;
1958  case NODE_ERROR:
1959  res.description = "Either GenICam node name is invalid or "
1960  "the node is inaccessible.";
1961  return true;
1962  case EVENT_ALREADY_ON_ERROR:
1963  res.description = "Event already started.";
1964  return true;
1965  case EVENT_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR:
1966  res.description = "Event already terminated.";
1967  return true;
1968  case ACQ_ALREADY_ON_ERROR:
1969  res.description = "Acquisition already started so that the requested "
1970  "operation cannot be processed.";
1971  return true;
1972  case ACQ_ALREADY_OFF_ERROR:
1973  res.description = "Acquisition already disabled so that the requested "
1974  "operation cannot be processed.";
1975  return true;
1976  case CHUNK_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR:
1977  res.description = "This device does not support chunk.";
1978  return true;
1979  case CHUNK_NAME_ERROR:
1980  res.description = "The given chunk name does not exist or not "
1981  "available.";
1982  return true;
1983  case TRIGGER_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR:
1984  res.description = "Either trigger is not supported OR the GenICam node is non-standard. Please directly access the GenICam node.";
1985  return true;
1986  case TRIGGER_NAME_ERROR:
1987  res.description = "The given trigger selector and/or the source "
1988  "does not exist or not available.";
1989  return true;
1990  case EVENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ERROR:
1991  res.description = "Either Event callback is not supported or "
1992  "not available.";
1993  return true;
1994  case EVENT_NAME_ERROR:
1995  res.description = "The given event name and/or callback node "
1996  "does not exist or not available.";
1997  return true;
1998  }
1999 
2000  if ((last_error_ < -1000 && last_error_ > -1023) ||
2001  last_error_ <= -10000)
2002  {
2003  res.description = "GenTL error code. "
2004  "Please refer to GenTL documentation.";
2005  return true;
2006  }
2007  res.description = "Error code is unknown.";
2008  return true;
2009  }
2010 
2011 
2012  void StCameraInterface::initializeCameraInfo()
2013  {
2014  // camera name
2015  if (!cinfo_.setCameraName(camera_namespace_))
2016  {
2017  ROS_WARN("Unable to set camera name %s", camera_namespace_.c_str());
2018  }
2019 
2020  // calibration file
2021  std::string calibration_file = param_->getCalibrationFile(nh_,
2022  camera_namespace_);
2023  if (!calibration_file.empty())
2024  {
2025  ROS_INFO("Calib file %s: %s",camera_namespace_.c_str(),
2026  calibration_file.c_str());
2027  if (cinfo_.validateURL(calibration_file))
2028  {
2029  cinfo_.loadCameraInfo(calibration_file);
2030  }
2031  else
2032  {
2033  ROS_WARN("%s Invalid calibration file %s",
2034  camera_namespace_.c_str(), calibration_file.c_str());
2035  }
2036  }
2037  else
2038  {
2039  ROS_WARN("%s No calibration file found", camera_namespace_.c_str());
2040  }
2041 
2042  try
2043  {
2044  sensor_msgs::CameraInfoPtr cam_info(new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo(
2045  cinfo_.getCameraInfo()));
2046  GenApi::CNodeMapPtr mp = tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
2047 
2048  // frame id
2049  cam_info->header.frame_id = camera_namespace_;
2050 
2051  // binning x
2052  GenApi::CIntegerPtr bin_h_val(mp->GetNode(
2053  GenICam::gcstring("DecimationHorizontal")));
2054  cam_info->binning_x = bin_h_val->GetValue();
2055 
2056  // binning y
2057  GenApi::CIntegerPtr bin_v_val(mp->GetNode(
2058  GenICam::gcstring("DecimationVertical")));
2059  cam_info->binning_y = bin_v_val->GetValue();
2060 
2061  // width
2062  GenApi::CIntegerPtr width_max_val(mp->GetNode(
2063  GenICam::gcstring("WidthMax")));
2064  cam_info->width = width_max_val->GetValue();
2065 
2066  // height
2067  GenApi::CIntegerPtr height_max_val(mp->GetNode(
2068  GenICam::gcstring("HeightMax")));
2069  cam_info->height = height_max_val->GetValue();
2070 
2071  // ROI
2072  GenApi::CNodePtr roi_node(mp->GetNode(
2073  GenICam::gcstring("RegionSelector")));
2074  if (GenApi::IsWritable(roi_node))
2075  {
2076  GenApi::CEnumerationPtr roi_val(roi_node);
2077  GenApi::CEnumEntryPtr roi_entry(roi_val->GetEntryByName(
2078  GenICam::gcstring("Region0")));
2079  roi_val->SetIntValue(roi_entry->GetValue());
2080  GenApi::CIntegerPtr width(mp->GetNode(GenICam::gcstring("Width")));
2081  GenApi::CIntegerPtr height(mp->GetNode(GenICam::gcstring("Height")));
2082  GenApi::CIntegerPtr offsetx(mp->GetNode(GenICam::gcstring("OffsetX")));
2083  GenApi::CIntegerPtr offsety(mp->GetNode(GenICam::gcstring("OffsetY")));
2084  if (GenApi::IsReadable(width))
2085  {
2086  cam_info->roi.x_offset = offsetx->GetValue();
2087  cam_info->roi.y_offset = offsety->GetValue();
2088  if (width->GetValue() != cam_info->width ||
2089  height->GetValue() != cam_info->height)
2090  {
2091  cam_info->roi.width = width->GetValue();
2092  cam_info->roi.height = height->GetValue();
2093  }
2094  }
2095  cam_info->roi.do_rectify =
2096  (cam_info->roi.width > 0 && cam_info->roi.width < cam_info->width) ||
2097  (cam_info->roi.height > 0 && cam_info->roi.height < cam_info->height);
2098  }
2099  cinfo_.setCameraInfo(*cam_info);
2100  }
2101  catch(...)
2102  {
2103  }
2104  }
2105 
2106  GenApi::INodeMap *StCameraInterface::getNodeMap(std::string &module_name)
2107  {
2108  if (module_name.compare("System") == 0)
2109  {
2110  return tl_dev_->GetIStInterface()->GetIStSystem()->GetIStPort()
2111  ->GetINodeMap();
2112  }
2113  if (module_name.compare("Interface") == 0)
2114  {
2115  return tl_dev_->GetIStInterface()->GetIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
2116  }
2117  if (module_name.compare("LocalDevice") == 0)
2118  {
2119  return tl_dev_->GetLocalIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
2120  }
2121  if (module_name.compare("RemoteDevice") == 0)
2122  {
2123  return tl_dev_->GetRemoteIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
2124  }
2125  if (module_name.compare("DataStream") == 0)
2126  {
2127  return tl_ds_->GetIStPort()->GetINodeMap();
2128  }
2129  return nullptr;
2130  }
2131 
2132  MapCallback *StCameraInterface::getCallbackMap(std::string &module_name)
2133  {
2134  if (module_name.compare("System") == 0)
2135  {
2136  return &map_event_system_;
2137  }
2138  if (module_name.compare("Interface") == 0)
2139  {
2140  return &map_event_interface_;
2141  }
2142  if (module_name.compare("LocalDevice") == 0)
2143  {
2144  return &map_event_localdevice_;
2145  }
2146  if (module_name.compare("RemoteDevice") == 0)
2147  {
2148  return &map_event_remotedevice_;
2149  }
2150  if (module_name.compare("DataStream") == 0)
2151  {
2152  return &map_event_datastream_;
2153  }
2154  return nullptr;
2155  }
2156 
2157  void StCameraInterface::publishEventDefault(omronsentech_camera::Event &msg)
2158  {
2159  std::string default_event = STMSG_event;
2160  MapPublisher::iterator it = map_msg_event_.find(default_event);
2161  if (it == map_msg_event_.end())
2162  {
2163  map_msg_event_.insert(std::pair<std::string, ros::Publisher>(
2164  default_event,
2165  nh_.advertise<omronsentech_camera::Event>(default_event,
2166  queue_size_)));
2167  map_msg_event_[default_event].publish(msg);
2168  }
2169  else
2170  {
2171  it->second.publish(msg);
2172  }
2173  }
2174 
2175 } // end of namespace stcamera
